channel.title: Question
channel.description: Is there anyway i can take pictures from my cell phone through a website? my phone does not have internet so i can't upload it. any help?

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

If you have a picture on your phone and you wish it to be on your computer.

  1. Usb connect the two and get the image
  2. go to the image on your phone, select it and press “Send” then send it to your email address. It should work, its worked for me countless times.

Read full topic

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @error.login cane
item.description:
@error.login wrote:

[quote=“Cryme Time, post:3, topic:180484”][quote author=darkdemun link=topic=241773.msg2046310#msg2046310 date=1202717465]
i think he wants to SMS the pictures to a website… if so i’m not sure if there are any sites offering that service.
[/quote]

Neither of you got what i was saying, number 1 thats the first thing i tried out of common sense usb cord. and i want the website to grab it from my phone.[/quote]
how is that possible if your phone has no internet… in less you use blue tooth

if it doesnt have a USB port, your screwed, get a camera cheap ass.
